definitions.definition: a state in which two things are able to exist or occur together without problems or conflict.
examples: he argues for the compatibility of science and religion
synonyms: but they also enjoy a real compatibility"

definitions.definition: a feeling of sympathy and friendship; like-mindedness.
examples: they felt the bond of true compatibility

definitions.definition: the ability of one computer, piece of software, etc., to work with another.
examples: software compatibility is another important factor to consider
